item.title: OpenAI drops Deep Research access to Plus users, heating up AI agent wars with DeepSeek and Claude
item.description: OpenAI expands Deep Research AI agent to ChatGPT users, intensifying competition with DeepSeek and Anthropic.

item.title: How big U.S. bank BNY manages armies of AI agents
item.description: As investment bank BNY plans to upgrade its AI tool Eliza, it's looking forward to creating smart recommendation AI agents.

item.title: Google makes Gemini Code Assist free with 180,000 code completions per month as AI-powered dev race heats up
item.description: Google’s decision to provide a free version with significantly higher usage limits positions Gemini Code Assist as a compelling choice.

item.title: Adobe launches first Photoshop mobile app and it has amazing Firefly AI-powered object detection, editing, and effects
item.description: Photoshop mobile includes Firefly-powered gen AI features like Generative Fill and Generative Expand and has mobile-adjusted touch targets.

item.title: Prompt AI’s Seemour launches visual intelligence platform for the home
item.description: Prompt AI, a smart home and visual intelligence research and technology company, has launched Seemour, a visual intelligence platform.
